In [47]: year, profit = loadtxt("C:\\Users\\ojasa\\company-a-data.txt", unpack=True)

In [48]: scatter(year, profit)
Out[48]: <matplotlib.collections.PathCollection at 0x21809838130>

In [56]: clf()

In [57]: scatter(year, profit, color="r", marker="d")
Out[57]: <matplotlib.collections.PathCollection at 0x2180e5153a0>

In [60]: x = linspace(1, 20, 100)

plot a loglog graph for y = 5x^3 and for x from 1 to 20
In [61]: y = 5 * x ** 3

In [62]: clf()

In [63]: loglog(x, y)
Out[63]: [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x21808ac1df0>]
